items.content: (pattakkaarum shemmaashshanmaarum amshavasthrangall dharichu ellaavarum mezhukuthirikallum katthichu pidich, sleebaa, evangeliyon, kuda, kodi, aadiyaayavayum edutthukondu palllliyude vadakke vaathil vazhi purappettu theejvaalakkuzhiyude sthhaanatthekku thaazhekkaanunna geetham chollikkondu pokunnu. Avide etthi kuzhiyude padinyaaruvashatthu kizhakkottu thiri nyu ninnukondu 'paulosu shleehaa' ennulllla geetham cholli yashesham kuzhiyude thekkukizhakku bhaagatthuninnukondu shleehaa yum thudarnnu evangeliyonum vaayikkunnu. Evangeliyonil 'avar iprakaaram paranyu daivatthe sthuthichu', ennullllidatthu vaayana nirutthiyittu aa sthuthippu ellaavarumkoodi chollukayum appoll pattakkaar thee kollutthukayum cheyyunnu. Anantaram maalaakhamaarude sthuthippumuzhuvanum ellaavarumkoodi chollikkondu theejvaalaykku moonnupraavashyam pradakshinam vaykkunnu. Pinneedu evangeliyon vaayichunirutthiya sthhaanam muthal veendum aarambhichu avasaanam vare vaayichashesham thudarnnu 'nyangallude kartthaavaaya yeshumishihaa' ennullllathum oru kaumaayum cholliyittu pallllikku chuttum pradakshinam nadatthunnu. Pradakshinamkazhinyu thekkevaathil vazhi akatthu praveshichu beemaayilo madbahaayilo ninnukondu sleebaa aaghosham nadatthunnu).

content:
Jvaalayani-nyon thanuve-nti
Nyangalle sam-rakshippaa-naayu
Maanavaroopam poondaanaa-shcha-ryam.

Ompathumaa-sam chenna-ppoll
Jananee mu-draykkethum kedenye
Velliyil vannaanaa-shcha-ryam.

Muppathuva-thsaramippaa-ril
Vaanengall-kkaayu paadettu
Manasaa maranam poondaanaa-shcha-ryam.

Moonnudinam-kabaril me-vee-
Ttuththhithanaayu svargaaroham
Haaleluyyaa cheythaanaa-shcha-ryam.

Daaveedin-geetham po-le
Kaalaathee-tham thaatha-nil ni-
Nnullavaayonaam suthanaam ma-shihaa-ye

Thiruvulllla-tthaal daavee-din
Nandanayaayu vimalathayolum
Kanyaka kaalatthikavil pra-savichu.

Nammude-rakshaykkaayu va-nnon
Mashihaayaam-naathhan noonam
Ekaprakrthi ekan sutha-ne-kan.

Thaathannum-mariyaaminnum
Ekasuthan poorvajanantyan
Melorunaallum bhedam koo-daa-tthon

Bhaavavumaa-llum randunde-
Nnotheedunnon shaapaarhan
Haaleluyyaa narakamavan-ne-dum.

Bhaagyavathee! Ennoducho-lka
Evvallavaadaravodettu
Paarum vaanum nirayunno-ne-nee

Kaathathiloo-dollivaaye-ree
Nishchalamaayudare vaanaan
Thiruhithamaayu than balamenne-thaa-ngi

Muttinme-l nyaan nilako-ndu
Lokapuraathananeppettoll
Haaleluyyaa rakshichaa-n lo-kam.

Pravachanamaam-drshdaantangall
Upamakallum saarththhakamaa-yi
Nrpadaaveedin makallaam ma-riyaa-mil

Poorushaba-ndham theendaa-the
Poorvvikanekkanyakapettoo
Garudeshvarane praakkilli thaan-potti.

Nijabaliyaa-l paapam nee-kki
Paazhbaliyeennulakine veendo-
Rajapothatthe pennaadum-pe-ttu.

Thaathanil ni-nnaagathanaa-yi
Daaveedin-suthayil jaatham
Cheythulakatthe rakshicho-n dha-nyan.

items.content: Ennaal akkaalatthu aagusthosu kesaril ninnu thante aadhipathyatthilpetta janangallellaam pervazhi chaartthappedanamennu oru kalppanayundaayi. Koorinosu sooriyaayil naaduvaazhiyaayirikkumpoll ithu aadyatthe pervazhi chaartthalaayirunnu. Svantapattanatthilvachu pervazhichaartthappeduvaanaayittu ellaavarum poyikkondirunnu. Yauseppum daaveedinte gothratthilum kudumbatthilum ullppettavanaayirunnathukondu yeehoodil daaveedinte bethalahem ennu villikkappedunna pattanatthilekk; galeelaayile nasrathu pattanatthilninnu thanikku vivaahatthinu nishchayikkappettirunna garbhiniyaaya mariyaaminodukoode -pervazhi chaartthappeduvaanaayittu poyi. Avar avide paarkkumpoll avallkku prasavakaalam vannu. Appoll avall thante aadyaputhrane prasavikkukayum avar paartthirunnidatthu sthhalamillaathirunnathu kondu kuttiye vasthrangall puthappichu oru pulkkoottil kidatthukayum cheythu. Avar paartthirunna sthhalatthu raathriyaamangallil thangallude aattinkoottangalle kaatthukondirunna aattidayanmaar undaayirunnu. Daivatthinte maalaakhaa appoll avarude adukkal chennu. Kartthaavinte thejassu avarudemel shobhichu. Avar vallare bhayappedukayum cheythu. Maalaakhaa avarodu “ningall bhayappedendaa. Sarvvalokatthinnum undaakuvaanulllla oru mahaasantosham nyaan ningalle ariyikkunnu. Mishihaa kartthaavu enna rakshithaavu ningallkkaayi innu daaveedinte pattanatthil janichirikkunnu. Ithu ningallkkadayaallam. Vasthrangall puthappichu oru pulkkoottil kidatthiyirikkunna shishuvine ningall kaanum.” pettennu aa maalaakhayodukoodi anekam svargasenakall prathyakshamaayi avar iprakaaram paranyu daivatthe sthuthichu.

content:
Ullavaaka! Sthuthi daivatthinu vaanil
/tdharaniyathil shaanti
Nalloru sharanam naralokarkkum.

Maalaakhamaar avare vittu svargatthilekku poyashesham aattidayanmaar, "namukku bethalahemvare chennu kartthaavu nammodariyichaprakaaram undaaya aa samgathi kaanaam" ennu paranyu. Avar dhrthagathiyil chennu mariyaamineyum yauseppineyum pulkkoottil kidakkunna shishuvineyum kandu. Kandathinushesham avar

Aa shishuvinekkurichu thangallodu parayappetta samgathi prasiddhamaakki. Kettavarellaavarum aattidayanmaar paranya kaaryangallekkurichu athbhuthappettu. Mariyaamaakatte ee vaartthakallellaam hrdayatthil samgrahichu niroopichukondirikkukayaayirunnu. Thangallodu parayappettaprakaaram sakalathum kaanukayum kellkkukayum cheytha aattidayanmaar thannimittham daivatthe sthuthichum pukazhtthiyum kondu madangippoyi.

Bethalahem vazhi pokumpoll-
Nyaanoru penmaniye kandu

Maanava va-thsalane! Purushaantaramaayu
Anayumthe-divasam thava sa-nnibhamaam

Ninnaall nya-ngallil ninnum pin-vaangi
Sandarshicheedunnanpaal veendum

Saakshaal kunyaadin janiyil doothum
Aattidaya-rkkarikil viravo-detthi.

Poyu varumee nararthan nirayil-naathhaa
Ninnaallil-koymaykkupamaanam nee.

Naathhaa nin-valuthaam divasam nyangall
Laghuvaakkeedaruthe, pizhamaa-yikka.

Ee divasam-rakshaapaanam-perum
Muntirithan navamaam kaniyin kulayaam

items.content: Daivamaaya kartthaave! Kanyakamariyaamilninnulllla ninte jananadivasatthe bahumaanikkuvaanum ninte jananatthinte maathrkaye nyangallude ullllil aaghoshikkuvaanum jeevapradamaaya ninte sleebaaye+ pukazhtthuvaanum nyangalle yogyaraakkaname. Nyangallude kartthaavum nithya daivavume! Nyangall ninnodapekshikkunnu. Ninakku preethikaramaaya salpravrtthikallaal eppozhum nyangalle aathmeeyamaayi janippikkumaaraakaname. Nyangalle sakala upadravangallilninnum ninte sleebaayude+ paarshvangallil samrakshichukollllukayum cheyyaname. Moraan.....

content:
Bethalahemile guhathannill
Jaathamcheythaan sakaleshan
Thanmaanatthinnaagatharaay
Praachiyilninnum praajnyanmaar
Kartthaavine vishvaasikalle
Sthothrasametham vaazhtthiduvin.

Bethalahemil daivasuthan
Jaatham cheythaanee divasam
Nibiyanmaar muncholliyathaam
Vachanam nikhilam mudrithamaayu
Thirujananatthe maanichaa
Sleebaayekkooppunnengall
Praarththhanayodadhunaa nyangall
Ghoshamodingane paadeedum.

items.content: Avivaahithayum nithyakanyakayum aayavallilninnu ekanaayi janicha ekasuthanaayullllaave! Ninte prakaasham nyangallude ullllil udippikkaname. Nyangallude kartthaavum nithyadaivavume! Unnathangallil daivatthinu sthuthi. Bhoomiyil samaadhaanam, manushyaril sampreethi, ennu maalaakhamaarodukoode attahasikkuvaan nyangalle yogyaraakkaname.

content:
Sundariyaam kanniyil ninnum
Nyoonathayenniye thanuvettaan
Vaanil thaathan than madiyil
Nyoonathayenniye nivasichaan
Sthuthiyaal menmel nammallkka-
Ngavane vaazhtthippaadeedaam.

Bethalahemile guhathannil
Paalakanullavaayennevam
Ee divasatthil doothanmaa-
Rajapaalanmaarkkariveki
Jaathikallapperunnaallghoshi-
Chaasleebaayekkooppunnu.

items.content: Mishihaathampuraane! Ninte jananatthaal melullllavarkku santoshavum aanandavum undaayi, bhaumikarkku nirappum samaadhaanavum prathyaashayum nalkappettu. Pithaavinum aadaaminum idayil sthhithicheythirunna kopam neekkappedukayum cheythu. Nyangallude kartthaavum nithya daivavume! Ninte perunnaallil santoshikkuvaanum kopatthilninnu svathantraraayittheeruvaanum nyangallkku krpanalkaname.

content:
Daivatthin maathaave! Nin
Naayakanaam kartthaavil nin
Ulltthadamabhimaanam kollvoo
Maanasamaanandikkunnu.
Ninnilninnu shareeratthe
Poondavanaam vachanam Daivam
Thirujananatthinu pimpiha nin
Kanyaathvatthe rakshichu.

Innoru shishu jaatham cheythu
Vismayamennathinabhidhaanam
Svayame Daivam shishuveppol
Thellivaayathuvismayamallo
Avaneyum rakshaakaramaam
Kurishineyum kooppunnulakam
Praarththhanayodadhunaa nyangall
Ghoshamodingane paadeedum.

items.content: Thiruvishdatthode jananatthinaayi varikayum thante jananatthaal kanyakayaaya maathaavinte mudrakallkko kanyaathvatthino azhivuvarutthaathirikkukayum cheythavanum anaadyantapithaavinte puthranum vachanavum aayullllove!

Samshayarahithamaayi nee Daivam thanneyaakunnu ennu ninnekkurichu grahikkuvaan nyangallkku krpa nalkaname. Nyangallude kartthaavum nithyadaivavume! Ninnil ninnulllla nirappum samaadhaanavum sakalavidhamaaya apakadangallilninnumulllla samrakshanavum nyangallkku pradaanam cheyyaname.

content:
Ee dinamaathmaja jananatthil
Bhoovil shaantiyathum vaanil
Sthuthiparanum naralokarkku
Sharanavumariyicheerenmaar.

Eesho naathhaa! Sleebaa, nin
Jananee praarththhanayennivayaal
Maayicheeduka nyangallil ni-
Nnullkopatthin praharangall.
Dishayengum nin shaantiyathum
Shamavum nivasippikkenam.
Praarththhanayodadhunaa nyangall
Ghoshamodingane paadeedum.

Doothanmaar se-vippone!
/teeshaa! Nee parishuddhan.
Krobenmaar vaazhtthunnone!
/tshakthaa! Nee parishuddhan
Sraappikall kaadee-shaarppone!
/tmrthiheenaa! Nee parishuddhan
Paapikallanuthaapatthodottharththhichothunnu.
/tnyangallkkaayu jaatham cheythone! Krpacheyyenam.

Theemayar haalal-cholvone!
/teeshaa! Nee parishuddhan
Aathmeeyar shlaa-ghippone
/tshakthaa! Nee parishuddhan
Manmayaraagho-shippone!
/tmrthiheenaa! Nee parishuddhan
Vishvaasiniyaam thirusabhathan suthararththhikkunnu.
/tnyangallkkaayu jaatham cheythone! Krpacheyyenam.

Melullllor maa-nippone!
/teeshaa! Nee parishuddhan.
Maddhyamar keertthikkunnone!
/tshakthaa! Nee parishuddhan.
Keezhullllor ku-ppunnone!
/tmrthiheenaa! Nee parishuddhan
Paapikallanuthaapatthodottharththhichothunnu
/tnyangallkkaayu jaatham cheythone! Krpacheyyenam.

Naathhaa! Krpacheytheedenam
/tnaathhaa! Krpacheyyuka kanivaal
Naathhaa! Karmmaarththhanakalle nee kaikkondum krpacheytheedenam
/tdeveshaa! The sthothram
Srashdaave! The sthothram
/tpaapikallaam daasarilaliyum mishihaa raajaave! Sthothram. Baarekmor
